languages.text: {n}Прикрыв глаза ладонью, Кассия печально качает головой.{/n} "Жар ваших оттенков слепит глаза, Лорд-капитан. Золото и алый окутывают нестерпимым сиянием все естество, но глубоко внутри... Я вижу трепещущий, изгнанный, ненавистный вами черно-синий мазок, что портит идеальную картину. Вы боитесь... оступиться? Одиночества? Что Император отвернется от вас?"

{n}Cassia covers her eyes with her hand and shakes her head sorrowfully.{/n} "The heat of your hues is blinding, Lord Captain. Scarlet and gold shroud your very essence in an overpowering radiance, but deep inside... I see a palpitating smudge of sable blue which you have banished, which you loathe, and which ruins the perfection of the image. Are you afraid... of a misstep? Of loneliness? Of the Emperor turning away from you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Прикрыв глаза ладонью, Кассия печально качает головой.{/n} "Жар ваших оттенков слепит глаза, Лорд-капитан. Золото и алый окутывают нестерпимым сиянием все естество, но глубоко внутри... Я вижу трепещущий, изгнанный, ненавистный вами черно-синий мазок, что портит идеальную картину. Вы боитесь... оступиться? Одиночества? Что Император отвернется от вас?"

Of the Emperor turning away from you?"

languages.text: {n}Cassia se tapa los ojos con la mano y niega tristemente con la cabeza.{/n} «El calor de sus tonos es cegador, Lord Capitán. Su esencia está envuelta en un resplandor abrumador de escarlata y oro, pero más adentro... veo una mancha de azul y sable que ha desterrado, que aborrece y que arruina el resto de la imagen. ¿Qué le da miedo... equivocarse? ¿La soledad? ¿Que el Emperador le abandone?».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia covers her eyes with her hand and shakes her head sorrowfully.{/n} "The heat of your hues is blinding, Lord Captain. Scarlet and gold shroud your very essence in an overpowering radiance, but deep inside... I see a palpitating smudge of sable blue which you have banished, which you loathe, and which ruins the perfection of the image. Are you afraid... of a misstep? Of loneliness? Of the Emperor turning away from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se tapa los ojos con la palma y niega tristemente con la cabeza.{/n} «El calor de sus tonos es cegador, Lord Capitán. Su esencia está envuelta en un resplandor abrumador de escarlata y oro, pero más adentro... veo una mancha de azul y sable que ha desterrado, que aborrece y que arruina el resto de la imagen. ¿Qué le da miedo... equivocarse? ¿La soledad? ¿Que el Emperador le abandone?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia se cache les yeux de sa main et secoue la tête avec tristesse.{/n} « La chaleur de vos couleurs est aveuglante, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Votre essence même est enveloppée d'éclatantes nuances rouge et or, mais au fond... je vois une tache palpitante d'un bleu sombre que vous avez bannie, que vous abhorrez et qui ruine la perfection de l'image. Avez-vous peur... de commettre un faux pas ? De la solitude ? Ou de perdre les bonnes grâces de l'Empereur ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia covers her eyes with her hand and shakes her head sorrowfully.{/n} "The heat of your hues is blinding, Lord Captain. Scarlet and gold shroud your very essence in an overpowering radiance, but deep inside... I see a palpitating smudge of sable blue which you have banished, which you loathe, and which ruins the perfection of the image. Are you afraid... of a misstep? Of loneliness? Of the Emperor turning away from you?"

Votre essence même est enveloppée d'éclatantes nuances rouge et or, mais au fond... je vois une tache palpitante d'un bleu sombre que vous avez bannie, que vous abhorrez et qui ruine la perfection de l'image. Avez-vous peur... de commettre un faux pas ? De la solitude ? Ou de perdre les bonnes grâces de l'Empereur ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは手で目を覆い、悲しげに首を振る。{/n}「陛下の色彩の熱量は目も眩むほどです、ロード・キャプテン。圧倒的な輝きで、真紅と黄金が御身の本質そのものを包み込んでいる。ですが、その奥底には…陛下が抹消し、忌み嫌った、脈動する青黒色の汚れが見えます。それがイメージの完璧さを損なっている。恐れているのは…過ちですか？それとも孤独？もしくは皇帝陛下から見捨てられることですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia covers her eyes with her hand and shakes her head sorrowfully.{/n} "The heat of your hues is blinding, Lord Captain. Scarlet and gold shroud your very essence in an overpowering radiance, but deep inside... I see a palpitating smudge of sable blue which you have banished, which you loathe, and which ruins the perfection of the image. Are you afraid... of a misstep? Of loneliness? Of the Emperor turning away from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは手で目を覆い、悲しげに首を振る。{/n}「陛下の色彩の熱量は目も眩むほどです、ロード・キャプテン。圧倒的な輝きで、真紅と黄金が御身の本質そのものを包み込んでいる。ですが、その奥底には…陛下が抹消し、忌み嫌った、脈動する青黒色の汚れが見えます。それがイメージの完璧さを損なっている。恐れているのは…過ちですか？それとも孤独？もしくは皇帝陛下から見捨てられることですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅用手遮住了眼睛，悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“你的颜色是如此刺眼，舰长大人。金色与猩红色的光芒笼罩着你的灵魂，但在你的内心深处……我却看到了一抹令人心悸的暗蓝色。那是你摒弃的一切，你厌恶的一切，它会破坏你的完美形象。你是害怕会……误入歧途吗？你是害怕孤独吗？还是害怕帝皇会离你而去？”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia covers her eyes with her hand and shakes her head sorrowfully.{/n} "The heat of your hues is blinding, Lord Captain. Scarlet and gold shroud your very essence in an overpowering radiance, but deep inside... I see a palpitating smudge of sable blue which you have banished, which you loathe, and which ruins the perfection of the image. Are you afraid... of a misstep? Of loneliness? Of the Emperor turning away from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅用手掌遮住了眼睛，悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“你的颜色是如此刺眼，舰长大人。金色与猩红色的光芒笼罩着你的灵魂，但在你的内心深处……我却看到了一抹令人心悸的暗蓝色。那是你摒弃的一切，你厌恶的一切，它会破坏你的完美形象。你是害怕会……误入歧途吗？你是害怕孤独吗？还是害怕帝皇会离你而去？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia bedeckt sich mit der Hand die Augen und schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Die Hitze Eurer Farben blendet mich, Lord Captain. Purpur und Gold umhüllen Eure Essenz mit überwältigendem Glanz, doch tief im Inneren ... Ich sehe einen pochenden Fleck schwärzliches Blau, den Ihr verbannt habt, den Ihr verabscheut, und der die Perfektion des Bildes zerstört. Fürchtet Ihr ... einen Fehltritt? Einsamkeit? Dass der Imperator sich von Euch abwendet?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia covers her eyes with her hand and shakes her head sorrowfully.{/n} "The heat of your hues is blinding, Lord Captain. Scarlet and gold shroud your very essence in an overpowering radiance, but deep inside... I see a palpitating smudge of sable blue which you have banished, which you loathe, and which ruins the perfection of the image. Are you afraid... of a misstep? Of loneliness? Of the Emperor turning away from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia bedeckt sich mit der Handfläche die Augen und schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Die Hitze Eurer Farben blendet mich, Lord Captain. Purpur und Gold umhüllen Eure Essenz mit überwältigendem Glanz, doch tief im Inneren ... Ich sehe einen pochenden Fleck schwärzliches Blau, den Ihr verbannt habt, den Ihr verabscheut, und der die Perfektion des Bildes zerstört. Fürchtet Ihr ... einen Fehltritt? Einsamkeit? Dass der Imperator sich von Euch abwendet?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, elleriyle gözlerini kapatıp başını kederle sallıyor.{/n} "Renklerinin sıcaklığı kör edici Lord Kaptan. Kızıl ve altın renkler özünü kaplıyor ama içinde... Sürgün ettiğin, nefret ettiğin ve mükemmeliyetini bozan, titrek koyu mavi bir leke görüyorum. Hata yapmaktan mı korkuyorsun? Yalnızlıktan mı? Yoksa İmparator'un sana sırtını çevirmesinden mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia covers her eyes with her hand and shakes her head sorrowfully.{/n} "The heat of your hues is blinding, Lord Captain. Scarlet and gold shroud your very essence in an overpowering radiance, but deep inside... I see a palpitating smudge of sable blue which you have banished, which you loathe, and which ruins the perfection of the image. Are you afraid... of a misstep? Of loneliness? Of the Emperor turning away from you?"
